Q7G.Text: Earlier you said you were less than satisfied with ease of exchanging or returning items, which of the following contributed to your rating?
Answer: Non-refundable fees (e.g. restocking, smart return label, etc.)

Q8.Text: Even in experiences with the premium products like those offered by Especially Yours, questions or problems may sometimes occur. Please read the list below and click the box(es) next to any questions or problems you experienced with Especially Yours {{(Q2.selectedText)}}.

Q9.Text: Which ONE of the questions or problems you cited do you consider to be your MOST IMPORTANT question or problem?

Q10.Text: Please describe your most important question or problem in more detail.

Q11.Text: Did you contact anyone at Especially Yours about your most important question or problem?

Q12.Text: What was your PRIMARY method of contact when attempting to resolve your most important question or problem?

Q13.Text: In total, how many times did you contact Especially Yours in an attempt to resolve your most important question or problem?

Q14.Text: Has final action been taken to resolve your most important question or problem?

Q15.Text: Which ONE of the following statements best describes your feelings about the action taken by Especially Yours to resolve your most important question or problem?

Q15A.Text: What did Especially Yours do to ensure your satisfaction when addressing your most important question or problem?

Q16.Text: How many other people (e.g., friends, family) have you told about your most important question or problem with Especially Yours and the action taken to resolve your issue?

Q17.Text: Overall, how satisfied are you with Especially Yours?

Q19.Text: What one action could Especially Yours take to most improve your experience?

Q20.Text: Using a 0-10 scale where “10” means Extremely Likely and “0” means Not At All Likely, how likely are you to recommend Especially Yours?

Q21.Text: How likely are you to continue to purchase Especially Yours products in the future?

Q23.Text: Which other products do you wish Especially Yours offered?
Answer: Softer color palette (mint, soft pink, etc)

Q24.Text: Besides Especially Yours, what other brands of similar products have you purchased in the past 12 months?
Answer: Plus size retailers (Ashley Stewart,  Roamans, Lane Bryant)
